content.question: Which of the following changes should be made so that method findLongest will work as intended?

choices.label: Insert the statement lenCount = 0;between lines 2 and 3.
Insert the statement lenCount = 0;between lines 8 and 9.
Insert the statement lenCount = 0;between lines 11 and 12.
Insert the statement lenCount = 0;between lines 12 and 13.

content.answer: Insert the statement lenCount = 0;between lines 12 and 13.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
